mapper.sql: email_id, staff_id, email_title, email_content, email_time, email_man, email_addr, email_state
mapper.select:
select a.*,b.staff_name
from email_info a,staff_info b
where a.staff_id = b.staff_id
and a.email_title like #{emailTitle}
mapper.insert: insert into email_info (email_id, staff_id, email_title, email_content, email_time, email_man, email_addr, email_state) values (#{emailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emailTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{emailMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update email_info
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email_title = #{emailTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_content = #{emailContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_time = #{emailTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
email_man = #{emailMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_addr = #{emailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_state = #{emailState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where email_id = #{emailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
